dcterms:description: A new collection of Spanish blogs from five different countries: Argentina, Chile, Mexico, Peru, and Spain, used for language variety identification.
dcterms:title: HispaBlogs

dcterms:creator: L. Tan
M. Zampieri
N. Ljubešić
J. Tiedemann
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sentences in Bulgarian, Macedonian, Serbian, Croatian, Bosnian, Czech, Slovak, Argentinian Spanish, Peninsular Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, European Portuguese, Malay, Indonesian, and a group containing texts written in a set of other languages, used for discriminating similar languages.
dcterms:title: DSL Corpus Collection (DSLCC v. 2.0)
